Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hôtel Concorde Montparnasse, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Place de Catalogne and minutes from Bobino. This 4-star hotel is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Eiffel Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 354 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 354 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hôtel Concorde Montparnasse, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Place de Catalogne and minutes from Bobino. This 4-star hotel is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Eiffel Tower.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Place de Catalogne - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Bobino - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tour Montparnasse - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bourdelle Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Montparnasse - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Pasteur Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cartier Foundation for Contemporary Art - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Place Denfert-Rocherau - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place Vavin - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Paris Catacombs - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Paris Observatory - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Le Bon Marche - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Georges Brassens Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Musee du Luxembourg - 1.7 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Hôtel Concorde Montparnasse is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hôtel Concorde Montparnasse is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 24.5 km / 15.2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Essential Information:
Hotel does not accept 4 (or more) occupants in the same room. Applies to Twin, Double and Triple room. Applicable from 14/Jul/2011 to 31/Dec/2020
City tax not included and should be paid directly at the hotel Applicable from 22/Mar/2016 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: City tax is not included in the room rate and guests are required to pay at the hotel when they are checking out Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Late Cancellation, no-show and early departure will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Starting January 1st the City Tax per person per night and has to be paid by the guests directly at the hotel upon departure. Child policy on request. -BEDDING TYPE IS SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY-
